channel.title: Byes on Arvee's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Byes on Arvee's Blog

item.title: Good Bye
item.description: This is a good bye message, I don’t know yet who’s receiving it, I know how tho, my dead man switch is pretty sweet (last time i tried i didn’t have one and that sucked ass). I was thinking of making a more elaborate plan but simple will have to do. I’ve been struggling with mental health lately, I would spend entire days without talking to anyone in real life, not by choice mind you, I just literally don’t have anyone to talk to and everyone I’d talk to online wouldn’t care (not like I had online friends or anything, m talking about my girlfriend and my mom lol)
